name: Strike 42
description:
First Game Developed by the Official Game Development Club CG2D at IIT Mandi.

Hop into a thrilling survival adventure set in a foreordained grey world.... Help the commander fight his way through hordes of robos..... Survive till the end and revenge the death of your comrades.......

A game easy to play yet hard to master.....

Now go..... The robos are waiting for you..............

**After extracting the zip click on the Strike 42 Unity application to Play**

Controls: 

1)W,A,S,D to Move , Space to Jump

2)Z to Change Gun

3)R to Reload

4)Left click to Shoot and Right click to use Scope

Team Leaders: Akarshan & Alhad

AI Lead: Ravi and Rishabh

Design Lead: Aditya Sahu

Core Team Members: Lakshya, Swarnrup, Sourabh, Khilan, Rohit. 

Social Media Handles:

1) Instagram: CG2D IG Link

2)YouTube: CG2D Channel Link

3)Alternate Link for download : Strike 42 Alternate Link

Signing off (for now),

CG2D,

IIT Mandi
